nodes.text: Spiran Fireflies were a species of firefly native to the planet Batuu. Their calls could be heard from within Black Spire Outpost. Some residents of Batuu raised fireflies to become pets or for other reasons.

Spiran Fireflies were created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While not physically present in the park, sound clips of the insects' calls can be heard in certain areas.
